content.rendered:
Directed by Gagan Bhullar. Sudha Kongara.

Written by Harshavardhan. Sudha Kongara. Sudha Kongara. Nandini Sharma.

Cast Venkatesh Daggubati(Adi). Ritika Singh(Rameshwari (Ramudu)). Mumtaz Sorcar(Lakshmi (Lux)). Nassar(Punch Ponds). Zakir Hussain(Dev Khatri). Tanikella Bharani(Murali). Raghu Babu(Somulu). Bipin(Innocent). Anitha Chowdary(Rajyam) .Ananth.Sanchana Natarajan.Ramajogayya Sastry

Language Telugu.

Producers Chakravarthy Ramachandra. S. Sashikanth.

Production Goldmines Telefilms. Y Not Studios.
